wikipedia_page.main: Shaun Irwin (born 8 December 1968) is an English former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s and 1990s. He played at representative level for Great Britain, and at club level for Castleford (Heritage № 651), Oldham Bears (Heritage № 1015) and Featherstone Rovers (Heritage № 755) (captain), as a centre or second-row, i.e. number 3 or 4, or, 11 or 12.
